name: garage
description: Garage is a distributed storage backend designed for self-hosted deployments. It replicates data across nodes, supports S3-compatible APIs, and is built for durability and low-overhead cloud-style storage.
features: Distributed Storage: Replicate data across multiple nodes for high availability and fault tolerance.
S3 Compatibility: Use standard S3 APIs for seamless integration with existing tools and applications.
Low Overhead: Lightweight design optimized for self-hosted deployments with minimal resource requirements.
Data Replication: Automatically replicate objects across nodes to ensure durability and redundancy.
Geo-Distribution: Deploy storage nodes across multiple locations for geographic redundancy.
Self-Hosted Cloud: Build your own S3-compatible object storage without relying on commercial cloud providers.
Resilient Architecture: Handle node failures gracefully with automatic failover and data recovery.
Simple Deployment: Easy setup and configuration for small to medium-scale distributed storage clusters.
